19.6. Univariate CNN Model 374
Next, we reshape the input into the expected three-dimensional structure.
# reshape into [1, n_input, 1]
input_x = input_x.reshape((1, len(input_x), 1))
Listing 19.10: Example of reshaping input data.
We then make a prediction using the Ô¨Åt model and the input data and retrieve the vector of
seven days of output.
# forecast the next week
yhat = model.predict(input_x, verbose=0)
# we only want the vector forecast
yhat = yhat[0]
